name: edk-route-verifier
description: Extreme Way of the Cross project route verifier

scripts.bundle:test: cross-var browserify src/routeVerifier.js -o server/static/js/"$npm_package_name".js && cross-var uglifyjs server/static/js/"$npm_package_name".js -o server/static/js/"$npm_package_name".min.js
scripts.bundle:dist: mkdir dist && cross-var browserify src/routeVerifier.js -o dist/"$npm_package_name".js && cross-var uglifyjs dist/"$npm_package_name".js -o dist/"$npm_package_name".min.js
scripts.git:branch: cross-var git branch $npm_package_version && cross-var git checkout $npm_package_version
scripts.git:commit: git add dist/* && git commit -m "Added artifacts for new version"
scripts.deploy:clean: git checkout master && cross-var git branch -D $npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:current: npm run bundle:test && npm test && npm run git:branch && npm run bundle:dist && npm run git:commit && cross-var git tag v$npm_package_version && npm run git:push
scripts.deploy:next: npm run bundle:test && npm test && npm run git:branch && npm run bundle:dist && npm run git:commit && npm run version:patch && npm run git:push

author: Jakub Niezgoda (qooban)
